title: Divya Kanti Padakam: Emerald & Polki Diamond Statement Necklace
materials: Emeralds. Crafted with meticulous detail and finished with a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish to enhance its antique charm.
features: This exquisite Padakam features a series of intricately designed circular pendants, each centered with a floral motif crafted with Polki diamonds. Emerald accents are interspersed between the pendants, adding a vibrant contrast. The setting is designed to maximize the sparkle of each Polki, and the piece boasts a delicate yet secure clasp.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (from the Polki diamonds) with vibrant green emerald accents.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations such as weddings (Muhurtham)
or cultural events. Can also be styled for formal occasions where you want to make a statement.
description: This necklace is a testament to timeless South Indian craftsmanship. The use of Polki diamonds and emeralds provides a unique vintage aesthetic, while the gold provides the piece with immense value and gives it a classic, elegant appeal. Its classic design ensures its lasting beauty and high value.
